QuestData.Title: Battle for Azeroth: Mission Statement
QuestData.Description:
$n! The Warchief has summoned you to undertake a mission of the utmost secrecy.
The very future of the Horde is at stake.
QuestData.LogDescription: Receive your mission from Warchief Sylvanas Windrunner within Orgrimmar.
QuestData.RewardText: The Dark Lady has placed her trust in us. We will not fail her, $n.

Objectives.Objective: Speak to Warchief Sylvanas Windrunner in Orgrimmar
